content.html:
It's already deprecated. The need for the pragmas is because we're constructing a gazebo::math::Vector2i.

I looked up for a way to automatically ignore deprecation warnings from within deprecated functions, but didn't find anything. It would be nice not to need the pragmas... It will be a loooot of lines once we deprecate Vector3 and Pose

#!/osrf/gazebo/src/d34d108d41020bb43ee4d8b962ad7adc1fd6c865/gazebo/gui/ModelManipulator.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelManipulator.hh-187
